content: Singaporean physicist **Handong Sun** is a Singaporean physicist currently at [Nanyang Technological University](/wiki/Nanyang_Technological_University) and an Elected Fellow of the [American Physical Society](/wiki/American_Physical_Society). This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about a physicist is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Handong Sun
